## TransformTransactionParams interface

Perform transformations on the transaction before

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TransformTransactionParams<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [endTransaction](./core-types.transformtransactionparams.endtransaction.md) | <code>TransactionTransformer&lt;GSchema&gt;</code> | Transforms the transaction before after all other actions are performed.<!-- -->This is called immediately before the dispatch. |
|  [startTransaction](./core-types.transformtransactionparams.starttransaction.md) | <code>TransactionTransformer&lt;GSchema&gt;</code> | Transforms the transaction before any other actions are done to it.<!-- -->This is useful for updating the transaction value before a command does it's work and helps prevent multiple dispatches. |
